item.title: Mastering Azure DevOps Pipelines
item.description:
Get a deep, practical walkthrough of Azure DevOps pipelines from configuration to advanced release orchestration.

What You’ll Learn

  • Pipeline architecture and YAML structuring
  • Secure secrets and environment approvals
  • Strategies for multi-stage deployments
  • Debugging pipeline failures quickly

Prerequisites

  • Basic Azure knowledge
  • An Azure DevOps account
